item.title: These cheap stock markets could make you more money than the usual picks
item.description: Why now may be a good time to add European equities to your stock portfolio.

item.title: Yes, income from your winning Super Bowl wager on the Eagles is taxable. So were winning bets on the election in November.
item.description: Prediction-market winnings are taxable income, even if platforms don’t send a notice reporting the money to the recipient and the IRS.

item.title: The ‘Magnificent Seven’ companies just did something they haven’t in two years. Goldman says it’s time to make a shift.
item.description: Goldman Sachs finds an oddity under the hood of earnings season when it comes to major technology companies.

item.title: Oil prices shake off tariff worries to rise after 3 straight weekly declines
item.description: Oil futures rose Monday, finding support after three straight weekly declines that took crude to its lows of the new year.

item.title: Bond yields steady ahead of looming Powell testimony, CPI data
item.description: Bond yields held to a tight range on Monday, as investors balanced upcoming inflation data and Federal Reserve testimony with new tariffs.
